import React from 'react' import '../styles/pages/Game.css'; class Game extends React.Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { selected: 'X', one: '', two: '', three : '', four: '', five: '', six: '', seven: '', eight: '', nine: '', }; } handleGameClick = ({ target }) => { const { name } = target; this.setState({ [name]: 'X', selected: 'O' }); }; render() { const { one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine } = this.state; return (

Jogo da Velha

) } } export default Game
